name: Asylum - Insidious Maduro - 50x5
additionalNotes: The sweet capped, Insidious line by Asylum is in for another addition to the family. Riding high on the success of the Connecticut-shade, original Insidious line, the next offering comes to you sporting a Mexican San Andres wrapper leaf, and houses the same Honduran long-fillers and binder as the original. Equipped with a deliciously robust profile, Insidious Maduro boasts heady notes of cream, spice, and cocoa with a razor sharp burn. Sticking to a similar every day price-point, this offering is sure to sneak its way into regular rotations of sweet-cap fanatics overnight.Â
